00021 #include "StringUtilities.h"

00025     //CSVTOSQLITE-240
00026     void StringUtilities::FixHeaderVarName(string& VarName)
00027     {
00028         if (VarName == "dbsnp-date")
00029         {
00030             VarName = "dbsnp_date";
00031         }
00032         else if (VarName == "dbsnp-version")
00033         {
00034             VarName = "dbsnp_version";
00035         }
00036     }
00037     
00038     void StringUtilities::CheckColumnName(const string& ColumnName, int ColumnIndex)
00039     {
00040          if (ColumnName.empty())
00041         {
00042             std::stringstream message;
00043             message << "Column name at position " << (ColumnIndex + 1) <<  " is empty!";            
00044             throw Except(message.str().c_str()); 
00045         }
00046     }
00047     string StringUtilities::MakeColumnName(string OriginalName)
00048     {
00049         Util::trimString(OriginalName);
00050         
00051         if (OriginalName.empty())
00052         {
00053            throw Except("Columns name is empty!"); 
00054         }
00055         string columnName;
00056         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < OriginalName.length(); i++)
00057         {
00058             char c = OriginalName[i];
00059             if (('a' <=  c && c <= 'z') || ('A' <=  c && c <= 'Z') || ('0' <=  c && c <= '9') )
00060             {
00061                 columnName += c;
00062             }
00063             else if ((c == ' ') || (c == '.') || (c == '-')  || (c == '/') || (c == '\\'))
00064             {
00065                 columnName += '_';
00066             }
00067         }
00068         
00069         if (columnName.length() == 0)
00070         {
00071             string message = "Column Name '";
00072             message += OriginalName;
00073             message += "' has no basic ASCII characters!";
00074             throw Except(message.c_str());
00075         }
00076         
00077         while (columnName.find("__") != std::string::npos)
00078         {
00079             Util::replaceString(columnName, "__","_");
00080         }
00081         
00082         return columnName;
00083     }
00084     
00085     bool StringUtilities::LooseCompare(string Str1, string Str2)
00086     {
00087         return true;
00088     }
